name: Elenore
author: YellowDi <yellowdi@me.com>
description: Modern CSS framework based on Flexbox

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-sass && npm run build-sass-min
scripts.build-sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --output css/ Elenore.sass --outFile css/Elenore.css
scripts.build-sass-min: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --output css/ Elenore.sass css/Elenore.min.css
